post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
Hi

I am searching for Java developers. for both contract and perm for the GTA,
clients are located by the airport and downtown. Contracts are 6 months to
start (renewable). Rates for both contract and perm are very competitive.

Please attached your latest resume as a word doc attachment. I will follow
up for discussion once received. I have multiple openings, please pass this
along to ALL your friends and colleagues!!

Do not hesitate to contact me should you have any questions. Please visit
the web site for job specifications.

thank you,
Karen Agulnik
Apex Search Inc.
900-45 Sheppard Ave
Toronto, Ontario
M2N 5W9
416-226-2828, ext 312
www.apexsearch.com
karen@apexsearch.com
post.title: Searching for perm and contract Java developers!!!
